A game that I originally disliked on it's original release due to being hugely un-optimised, network framework was trash and the bugs were riff. I personally believe it's safe to say that the game not only survived it's turbulent release, but has also thrived over the years it's been out, largely dealing with the concerns I had that initially drove me away from this game.

My only warning would be that the community can be a bit hit and miss, and it seems to be extremely easy to run into super salty individuals if a game doesn't go their way, so just be prepared for some serious keyboard warriors out there.

Other than that, grab some friends and play 4 man survivor or go at it solo as the killer. Good times to be had!
i love it. i suck at it, but i love it.

dead by daylight is a fun game as much as I think, but playing with the default characters of the game is boring and you want to play with more characters, so getting dlc is the easiest method dlc prices are already pretty good compared to 2020 and there are no bad killers coming in dlc, but there are some that need to be nerfed. There are murderers, for example, after the doctor shocked, the pallet is not dropped and the leather face saw is not dropped, and sometimes I get angry and hit the walls or something, sometimes the saw needs to be out of the game or it should be a short time like 3 seconds. It gets a little boring when you don't play with friends and you experience low performance because there is no game without infusion and blood network is one of the best parts of the game, but every match is really low blod point is too much fps problem in dead by daylight because there is no option like v-sync in the settings part of the game I just have to play 60 fps We cannot see how much performance we have and the system we have, apart from that, as in most multiplayer games, you have the possibility of having a nervous breakdown in this game and the murderers or victims are not randomly selected in the game, are the victims in the menu part of the game? or did he join? You can choose what you want to play and this is one of the best features of the game.
The rank system of the game is really fair, for example, it does not matter whether the killer or the victim in the match you play gives you + points according to the performance, which is one of my favorite features of the game.
turkey clock hard to find match at noon killer, but finding the victim's easy prune because in our country there are few players who played dead by daylight you say what relevance the other players is not the same as the clocks in our country for us in the morning that as soon as most of them in the hope evening recognizes the Turkish-player game, and they can enter with us in the same time so that we can enjoy playing our game without wasting time.

Ура! Наконец-то появилась игра, где разработчики думают о своих игроках... правда не о всех, а только о плаксах киллерах. Бедняжки, плак-плак.
perfect with friends and even without them, devs just wont stop adding content, lots of spooks.
Gra warta zakupu, choć na początku może wydawać się bardzo trudna.

Примерно в октябре 2019 года меня настолько доконала эта [strike]помойка[/strike] игра, что в следующий раз у меня хватило духу запустить ее только через год. На протяжении этого года не возникало даже малейшего желания зайти и посмотреть, что тут нового и как оно там вообще. Когда ощущение привкуса г*вна во рту пропало и я все же решился, то был удивлен: разрабы реально пофиксили кучу вещей за год, лобби как пример; добавили много контента, лор в том числе; забалансили перки и убийц, при этом не убив ни убийц, ни перки в хлам. Да, комьюнити такое же токсичное, но тут уже не разрабы виноваты. Короче, наконец-то они [i]дид э притти гуд джоб соу фар[/i].

WOW! Es ist einfach geil! Jeden Tag genieße ich es als Killer oder Überlebender zu spielen. Die täglichen Rituale, das Archiv, die Maps, Character Skins, etc. Alles ist super durchdacht und bietet abwechslungsreichen Spielspaß. Ich empfehle es sehr.

Rozhodně to není perfektní hra ale určitě zabaví. Pokud hrajete hru sám a učíte se ji pochopit tak rozhodně  nepovolte protože čím více si hru ošaháte tím víc vás bude bavit nebo si uvědomíte jak některé věci nesedí ale na to se dá zvyknout. Tato hra je o taktice (někdy ta taktika nefunguje kvůli nedostatků vyvažování charaktetů). Jedna z velkých mínusů je mikrotransakce, toto uvidíte u nově přidaných charakterů a jestli si chcete koupit postavu zadarmo tak musíte odehrát minimálně 100 hod. (aspoň to tak bylo u mě) protože za levly dostáváte exclusivnější herní měnu ale velmi nedostatečně.
Podtrženo sečteno tuto hru doporučuji ale radši si počkejte na nějakou tu slevičku a pak si hru kupte.
Es un juego interesante y se disfruta más con amigos.
gutes spiel aber nicht gruselig. macht spass
Lovely game at first. It has a very clear skill based gameplay. However, after a while, it can get stale. The new characters do make up for it and the new visuals are much better!
Good game with some thrills and laughs.
I love that there is always new stuff being added to the game. Although it hase a few bugs, they aren't too bad. There are also many ways to customize your character trough cosmetics.
